Class CountByStateVisitor

java.lang.Object
taskmanagement.domain.visitor.CountByStateVisitor
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITaskVisitor, TaskVisitor
public final class CountByStateVisitor extends Object implements TaskVisitor
Visitor that counts tasks by their TaskState and produces a ByStateCount report.

Supports record-based visits (Visitor + Records + Pattern Matching). Can also be used directly with ITask or TaskState.
